transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir, Rajan se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji namaskar, haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji ji sir, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu sir Prabhat Nimanagar.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji ji sir, mai keh raha tha sir ye aapko review rating ke liye sir aapne gangaan dala tha sir, toh abhi toh aapka review rating sir
Customer: Abhi toh ek toh sir do hi logo ne aapko rating kiya hai sir, ek toh October mein aur ek 18 November ko last.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Ji toh aap isse rating ko hatane ki baat kar rahe the kya?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Toh sir usme kya matlab ek kya tha matlab inhone kya galat feedback diya aap ye keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Toh woh galti se ho gaya un logo se, ab mai unse follow up le raha hu, pehle phone utha ke bole the galti se ho gaya, ab mai phone kar raha hu toh pick nahi kar rahe aur toh WhatsApp pe bhi reply nahi aa raha unka.
Executive: Toh sir rating wahi edit kar sakte hai sir, matlab unko boliye ki aap woh rating edit kare.
Customer: Dekhiye woh customer hai, mai call back karta hu aapko.
Executive: Aap mujhe call back kar lijiyega thodi der mein, hai na?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to remove review ratings.

- Customer says ratings were given by mistake.



Resolution:

- Executive said only those customers can edit ratings.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- review rating, edit, feedback
